Ange Postecoglou has been struggling to take it all in.
 A whirlwind first season at Celtic has allowed him to fulfil a lifetime ambition with success at a big club in Europe.

articles.title: Eddie Howe insists Newcastle performance vs Arsenal was 'the best since my arrival' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Eddie Howe was full of praise for his Newcastle players after they produced a brilliant display to beat Arsenal and all but end their hopes of qualifying for the Champions League.

articles.author: Mike Dickson, Charlotte Daly
articles.title: Laura Robson retires: Former junior Wimbledon champion and Olympic silver medallist ends career - Daily Mail
articles.description: Robson confirmed on Monday what most already assumed - that she was retiring in the wake of her latest hip surgery. She had not played a competitive match in more than three years.
articles.content:
Nearly half a lifetime has passed for Laura Robson since she caused a minor sensation by winning the junior Wimbledon event at 14.
Four years later in 2012, when she successively knocked Grand Slam … [+6502 chars]

articles.title: Emma Raducanu admits people may think she's 'crazy' after parting ways with three coaches - Daily Mail
articles.description: Speaking to the WSJ magazine, the Toronto-born tennis star, 19, said: ' That is definitely a journey [where] I'm learning on the way but it's just what works for me as an individual.
articles.content:
Emma Raducanu has opened up about her unusual pattern of replacing coaches, saying that she trusts her decision making, and feels that it's right for her as an individual.
